RelatedSentence: BOSTON - For years , the woman went to a Boston hospital to talk to a therapist about being depressed and overweight .
The therapist , listening closely , asked questions and jotted down notes on a memo pad .
The therapist , listening closely , asked questions and jotted down notes on a memo pad .
Until recently , the 54 - year - old woman did n't know what her therapist was writing .
Then , last month , her therapist offered to share his notes with her regularly .
